#include <iostream>
#include <cstdio>
using namespace std;
#define gc getchar_unlocked

void scanint(long long &x)
{
    register long long c = gc();
    x = 0;
    for(;(c<48 || c>57);c = gc());
    for(;c>47 && c<58;c = gc()) {x = (x<<1) + (x<<3) + c - 48;}
}
int main()
{
    int test;
    scanf("%d",&test);
    long long a,ans;
    while(test--)
    {
        scanint(a);
        ans=a/26;
        if(a%26!=0)
        {
            ans++;
        }
        printf("%lli\n",ans);
    }
}
